message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm making the first offer.
Let's try a bit more in my favor this time.
The value is going down, Bob! Let's settle this now. I'll take a bit less than my last offer, but more than yours.
Inflation is biting, but I still think I can get a better deal.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We're losing money with every round!
